snippet: Namibia’s departing president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been awarded the 2014 Ibrahim Prize for Achievement in African Leadership.
abstract: Hifikepunye Pohamba, Namibia's departing president, wins 2014 Ibrahim Prize for Achievement in African Leadership; awards committee honors two-term president for forging national cohesion and reconciliation and social and economic development; prize is worth over $5 million and is largest awarded annually.
lead_paragraph: Namibia’s departing president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been awarded the 2014 Ibrahim Prize for Achievement in African Leadership.

headline.main: Namibia: President Is Awarded $5 Million Prize for Good Governance
headline.print_headline: Namibia: President Is Awarded $5 Million Prize for Good Governance

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Ibrahim, Mo, Prize for Achievement in African Leadership
